docs.title: What is NewsAnalytics?
docs.text: NewsAnalytics is a comprehensive framework that automatically analyzes news events and translates them into actionable investment opportunities. It processes market signals, geopolitical developments, economic indicators, and emerging trends to provide systematic investment insights.

docs.title: Key Features
docs.text:
• 🔍 Automated News Analysis: Processes 80+ news stories daily from multiple sources
  • 📊 Causal Event Mapping: Links events to market implications using systematic frameworks
  • 💰 Investment Opportunity Identification: Maps events to specific investment plays across sectors
  • ⚡ Real-time Processing: Daily reports with fresh market analysis
  • 🎯 Systematic Approach: Uses structured frameworks for consistent analysis

docs.title: How It Works
docs.text:
# Daily analysis pipeline
news_events = collect_news_stories()
causal_analysis = analyze_event_chains(news_events)
investment_opportunities = map_to_investments(causal_analysis)
generate_daily_report(investment_opportunities)

The system employs multiple analytical frameworks:

  • Direct Impact Analysis: Companies directly addressing immediate problems
  • Substitute/Alternative Plays: Beneficiaries of shifted demand patterns
  • Infrastructure Plays: Long-term solutions and resilience companies
  • Financial/Insurance Plays: Risk transfer and recovery financing

docs.title: Why Build This?
docs.text:

docs.title: Universal Framework
docs.text:
Our Investment Translation Framework systematically categorizes all event types:

  • Weather & Environmental Events → Infrastructure and agriculture plays
  • Political & Regulatory Changes → Policy beneficiaries and compliance companies
  • Technological Disruptions → Innovation leaders and disruption casualties
  • Supply Chain Events → Alternative suppliers and logistics companies
  • Economic Events → Currency impacts and trade flow changes

Daily updates automatically processed and committed to maintain continuous market coverage

Framework processes events across all timeframes from immediate trading opportunities to long-term structural shifts

docs.title: Universal Event-to-Investment Translation Framework
docs.text: This framework systematically translates any news event into investment opportunities across all market conditions and timeframes.

docs.title: Event Detection Pipeline
docs.text:
1. News Aggregation - Monitor 100+ sources continuously
  2. Impact Assessment - Analyze scope, severity, duration
  3. Causal Chain Mapping - Identify primary, secondary, tertiary effects
  4. Investment Translation - Map effects to investable opportunities
  5. Timing Analysis - Determine optimal entry/exit points

docs.title: Implementation Algorithm
docs.text:
def analyze_event(event):
    # Step 1: Categorize event type
    category = classify_event(event)

    # Step 2: Assess impact parameters  
    impact = assess_scope_severity_duration(event)

    # Step 3: Map causal chains
    effects = map_causal_chains(event, impact)

    # Step 4: Identify investment opportunities
    opportunities = []
    for effect in effects:
        opportunities.extend(map_to_investments(effect, category))

    # Step 5: Analyze timing and risk
    for opp in opportunities:
        opp.timing = analyze_timing(opp, event)
        opp.risk_level = assess_risk(opp, impact)

    return opportunities

docs.title: Risk Levels
docs.text:
• 🟢 Low Risk: Established players, clear demand drivers
  • 🟡 Medium Risk: Competitive dynamics, regulatory uncertainty
  • 🔴 High Risk: Speculative plays, unproven business models

docs.title: Time Horizons
docs.text:
• Immediate (0-30 days): Trading opportunities, commodity plays
  • Short-term (1-6 months): Earnings impact, supply chain adjustments
  • Medium-term (6-24 months): Market share shifts, infrastructure buildout
  • Long-term (2+ years): Structural changes, new market creation
